item.title: Complete Guide: Unsteam - Playing Coop with Cracked Games
item.author: axekinn@proton.me (Axekin)
item.description:
Complete Guide: Unsteam - Playing Coop with Cracked Games

Author: Axekin(axekinn@proton.me)

üéÆ Introduction to Unsteam

Unsteam is a Steam emulator that allows cracked games to work with online multiplayer features. It simulates the Steam API to enable cooperation between players with unofficial versions.

‚ö†Ô∏è Legal Warning: This tutorial is for educational purposes only. Make sure to comply with your country’s laws regarding copyright. Ideally, you should own a legal copy of the game.

üìã Prerequisites

Minimum Configuration

  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Steam: Steam client installed and connected
  • Game: Compatible cracked version
  • Network: Stable Internet connection

Required Tools

  • Base64 decoder (for links)
  • Web browser
  • Archive manager (7-Zip, WinRAR)

üîß Step 1: Obtaining Files

Game Downloads 

# Base64 encoded link - Decode it
aHR0cHM6Ly9jcy5yaW4ucnUvZm9ydW0vdmlld2ZvcnVtLnBocD9mPTIy
  1. Decode the Base64 link above
  2. Access the cs.rin.ru forum
  3. Download your desired game

Unsteam Download 

# Base64 encoded link - Decode it
aHR0cHM6Ly9jcy5yaW4ucnUvZm9ydW0vdmlld3RvcGljLnBocD9mPTIwJnQ9MTM0NzA3
  1. Decode the Base64 link above
  2. Download the latest Unsteam version
  3. Extract the archive to a temporary folder

üîç Step 2: Game Information Research

Using SteamDB 

# Reference site
https://steamdb.info/
  1. Access SteamDB.info
  2. Search for your game by name
  3. Note the following information:
    • Main game AppID
    • DLC AppID (if present)
    • DLC Names

Example for God of War 

Game Name: God of War
Main AppID: 1593500
DLC Example: Digital Deluxe Edition (AppID: 1593501)

‚öôÔ∏è Step 3: Unsteam Configuration

Unsteam File Structure 

Unsteam/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam_loader_x64.exe    # Main launcher
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam_x64.dll          # Emulation library
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam.ini              # Configuration file

Configuring the unsteam.ini file

Create or modify the unsteam.ini file:

[loader]
exe_file=
dll_file=unsteam_x64.dll

[game]
real_app_id=387990
fake_app_id=480
language=english
beta_name=public
saves_path=saves

[dlcs]
appid1=DLC Name
appid2=DLC Name

Detailed Parameter Explanation

[loader] Section 

exe_file=GoW.exe                # Path to your game EXE
dll_file=unsteam_x64.dll       # Unsteam DLL (do not modify)

[game] Section 

real_app_id=1593500            # Real game AppID (from SteamDB)
fake_app_id=480                # Fake AppID (leave 480 as default)
language=english               # Game language (english/french/german/etc.)
beta_name=public               # Beta version (leave "public")
saves_path=saves               # Save folder

[dlcs] Section 

1593501=Digital Deluxe Edition # AppID=DLC Name
1593502=Season Pass            # AppID=DLC Name (example)

üìÅ Step 4: Installation and Configuration

File Placement 

YourGame/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ GoW.exe                    # Game executable
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam_loader_x64.exe     # ‚Üê Copy this file here
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam_x64.dll           # ‚Üê Copy this file here
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam.ini               # ‚Üê Create this file here
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ saves/                    # Save folder (auto-created)

Example Configuration for God of War 

[loader]
exe_file=GoW.exe
dll_file=unsteam_x64.dll

[game]
real_app_id=1593500
fake_app_id=480
language=english
beta_name=public
saves_path=saves

[dlcs]
1593501=Digital Deluxe Upgrade

üöÄ Step 5: Game Launch

Launch Procedure

  1. Launch Steam first
  2. Log in to your Steam account
  3. Navigate to your game folder
  4. Execute unsteam_loader_x64.exe (NOT the game .exe)
  5. Wait for loading

Functionality Verification 

‚úÖ Steam overlay visible
‚úÖ Steam profile displayed in game
‚úÖ Multiplayer functions active
‚úÖ Steam achievements unlocked (optional)

üåê Step 6: Cooperative Gaming

Network Configuration 

Mode 1: LAN via Hamachi/Radmin
Mode 2: Direct Steam connection
Mode 3: Community servers

Connecting with Friends

  1. Ensure your friends also use Unsteam
  2. Verify you have the same AppID configured
  3. Launch the game simultaneously
  4. Use normal multiplayer functions

üîß Common Troubleshooting

Frequent Issues

Game won’t launch 

‚ùå Problem: "Failed to load game"
‚úÖ Solution: Check the exe_file= path in unsteam.ini

Missing Steam overlay 

‚ùå Problem: No Steam overlay
‚úÖ Solution: Launch Steam BEFORE unsteam_loader_x64.exe

Non-functional multiplayer 

‚ùå Problem: Cannot join friends
‚úÖ Solution: Verify everyone uses the same real_app_id

DLL Error 

‚ùå Problem: "unsteam_x64.dll not found"
‚úÖ Solution: Place DLL in the same folder as the EXE

Logs and Debugging 

Generated log files:
- unsteam.log (in game folder)
- Steam logs (in Steam/logs/)

‚ö†Ô∏è Important Precautions

Steam Account Security

  • DO NOT use your main Steam account
  • Create a secondary account if necessary
  • Avoid games with aggressive anti-cheat

Game Compatibility 

‚úÖ Compatible: Steam coop/multiplayer games
‚úÖ Compatible: Games with Steam Workshop
‚ùå Incompatible: Games with EAC/BattlEye
‚ùå Incompatible: Games requiring Steam DRM

Updates 

Frequency: Check Unsteam updates monthly
Source: cs.rin.ru (official forum)
Version: Always use the latest stable version

üéØ Advanced Tips

Performance Optimization 

[advanced]
enable_overlay=1               # Enable Steam overlay
enable_achievements=0          # Disable achievements (optional)
enable_stats=1                 # Enable statistics
network_timeout=5000           # Network timeout in ms

Multi-Game Configuration 

Create a folder per game with its own configuration:
Games/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ GoW/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam.ini (GoW config)
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam_loader_x64.exe
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Elden Ring/
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam.ini (Elden Ring config)
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam_loader_x64.exe

Configuration Backup 

# Backup your configurations
backup/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam_configs/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ gow_unsteam.ini
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ eldenring_unsteam.ini
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ readme.txt

üìö Additional Resources

Useful Sites

  • SteamDB: https://steamdb.info/ (game information)
  • cs.rin.ru: Main community forum
  • Steam Calculator: AppID calculator

Community

  • Gaming community Discord servers
  • Specialized Reddit forums
  • Updated community guides

üí° Final Tip: Always test with free games or games you legally own before using with other titles. Cooperation works best with stable connections and identical configurations between players.

Published on 2025-06-04 at Wiki of Axekin, last modified on 2025-06-04
